actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.

official_title: A bill to authorize the addition of certain lands to Bandalier National Monument in the State of New Mexico.

summary.text: Authorizes the Secretary of the Interior to acquire specified lands for addition to the Bandelier National Monument, New Mexico. Authorizes the appropriation of such funds as may be necessary to carry out this Act.

titles.title: A bill to authorize the addition of certain lands to Bandalier National Monument in the State of New Mexico.
